description: A new general triangle sequence based on the Eulerian form in three parts ( subtraction):m=1; t0(n,k)=If[n*k == 0, 1, Sum[(-1)^j Binomial[n + 1, j](k + 1 - j)^n, {j, 0, k + 1}]] t(n,k,m)=If[n == 0, 1, ( m*(n - k) + 1)*t0(n - 1 + 1, k - 1) + (m*k + 1)*t0(n - 1 + 1, k) - m*k*(n - k)*t0(n - 2 + 1, k - 1)].
